summary: This final installment in Satyajit Ray's Apu Trilogy follows Apu's life as an orphaned adult aspiring to be a writer.
cast: Soumitra Chatterjee|Sharmila Tagore|Alok Chakravarty|Swapan Mukherjee|Tushar Bandyopadhyay|Gupi Banerjee|Panchanan Bhattacharya|Shanti Bhattacherjee|Jiten Bhons|Abhijit Chatterjee|Jogesh Chatterjee|Asha Devi|Belarani Devi|Sefalika Devi|Biren Ghosh|Dhiren Ghosh|Biresh Majumdar|Dhiresh Majumdar|Bechu Singha
title: Apur Sansar
